description: Try our easy to follow Fresh Cold Seafood Platter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Platter,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Seafood,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Easter,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Fresh Cold Seafood Platter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange on a plater fresh cooked prawns with halved lobsters and lemon wedges.
Serve with easy lime dressing: French dressing, lime juice, capers, chopped chives and salt and pepper.
